entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
